questions.text: Barbara Bain starred in what tv series?
questions.explanation:
'Space 1999'.

	After 'Mission Impossible', she starred with husband Martin Landau in this sci fi series. It didn't work.

questions.text: What author wrote about 'the melancholy Dane'?
Ferris Fain was prominent in what area?
questions.explanation:
Sports.

	A baseball player of many years ago.

questions.text: Will Kane is a character in what type of classic movie?
questions.explanation:
Western.

	He was the (Gary Cooper)sheriff in 'High Noon'.

questions.text: Marjorie Main played in what movie series?
questions.explanation:
Ma and Pa Kettle.

	Good career.

questions.text: John Payne starred in what Christmas movie classic?
questions.explanation:
'Miracle on 34th Street'.

	With young Natalie Wood.

questions.text: Johnny Sain was a player in what sport?
questions.explanation:
Baseball.

	A pitcher (who teamed with Warren Spahn for the Braves).

questions.text: Sybil Vane is a character in a novel by what author?
John Wayne starred in all of these movies EXCEPT:
Zane Gray is the author of which of these works?
questions.explanation:
'Riders of the Purple Sage'.

	His most famous novel.
